src_original: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām ayuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa pratibhātu
tgt_original: 爾時，世尊告尊者須菩提言：

src_original: te subhūte bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām ārabhya dhārmikīṅ kathāṅ kartuṃ  yathā bodhisatvā mahāsatvā prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto niryāyur iti //
tgt_original: 「隨汝樂欲，為諸菩薩摩訶薩如其所應，宣說般若波羅蜜多法門。

src_original: kin nu khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty uta buddhānubhāvena
tgt_original: 「今尊者須菩提，為以自智慧辯才而為宣說菩薩摩訶薩般若波羅蜜多耶？ 為以佛威神及加持力而為說耶？

src_original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ  ca mahāśrāvakāṇān teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇāñ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ
tgt_original: 」爾時，尊者須菩提承佛威神，知舍利子於如是色、如是心有所思念。 既知是已，即告舍利子言：

src_original: śāriputram etad avocat tat kiñcid āyuṣmañ cchāriputra bhagavataś śrāvakā bhāṣante  deśayanty udīrayanti sarvas sa tathāgatasya puruṣākāro veditavyas taṅ kasya hetor  yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyān dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavataś śrāvakās
tgt_original: 「汝今當知，世尊所有聲聞弟子，於諸法中若自宣說、或為他說，一切皆是佛威神力。 何以故？

src_original: tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya yad yad eva bhāṣante deśayanty
tgt_original: 佛所說法，若於是中能修學者，彼能證得諸法自性。
